Items.title: WHY WE LOVE IT
Items.description: In his early twenties, Demna Gvasalia owned a vintage Mac that he wore all the time until someone stole it at a party. Designed in collaboration with outerwear experts Mackintosh, this gabardine trench is based on that exact same coat, but it's been given a Vetements makeover with volume and oversized proportions. Some of the collective's staff visited the co-creator's factory in Scotland to ensure the most authentic craftsmanship.

Printed with stylized drawings of a feline in various poses, this sleeveless design has been made in Italy from lightweight silk-crepe and cut for a slightly loose fit. Try yours with denim and red sandals.

Made from pure cotton, this version is designed with a flattering high-rise and comfortable straight legs that hit just above the ankle. The versatile 'Seventies' wash will go with everything from printed blouses to basic tees.

Made in Italy from cream linen-blend, this wrap jacket is ornately decorated with embroidery and floral satin trims. Tie it at the waist to highlight the peplum hem.

Cut from soft denim that won't lose its shape, this '90s-inspired pair sits high on your waist and is distressed at the knees. The skinny silhouette has a leg-lengthening effect when worn with ankle boots.

Designed in a soft lemon hue inspired by the color palette of Robert Altman's 3 Women, this blouse is cut from weightless lace that floats over your body and has ruffled tiers to frame your shoulders.
